- **feat: New Model Inventory and Project Listing data-table display**. <!--- REPLACE THIS COMMENT WITH YOUR DESCRIPTION --->

New: Model Inventory and Project Listing results view toggle between Data Table and Card View

Introducing flexible listing viewing options:
Table View: Detailed, structured layout, easy to compare results
Card View: Visual, at-a-glance presentation.
Switch views easily by toggling the "Display table / Display cards" toggle button.
![card-table-toggle](https://github.com/validmind/frontend/assets/16059/0f552814-1be4-4819-9e67-304fbb146436)


<!---feat: Onboarding Guide by @gtagle in [#471](https://github.com/validmind/frontend/pull/471)--->
- **feat: Onboarding Guide**. The new Onboarding Guide will be presented to all users (new and existing) and will keep track of 6 tasks that can be completed non-linearly to get familiar with the ValidMind platform.

The Guide will be displayed on the bottom right corner of the screen and will be open by default displaying all six tasks.
<img width="1552" alt="image" src="https://github.com/validmind/frontend/assets/16059/c725bc9c-af1d-41d2-a410-64651da10a14">

- Get your Validmind account - (Completed by default and there just to communicate progress to new users)
- Register your model - Will open the Model Inventory and open the Model Registration modal, once clicked the item will be completed 
- Start on your model documentation - Will navigate the user to the Get Started page of user's latest Initial Model Validation project or a demo model's Initial Validation project. Once clicked the item will be completed.
- Collaborate on your documentation - Will navigate the user to the first Documentation page of user's latest Initial Model Validation project or a demo model's Initial Validation project. Once clicked the item will be completed.
- Submit your model documentation - Will navigate the user to the first Overview page of user's latest Initial Model Validation project or a demo model's Initial Validation project. Once clicked the item will be completed.
- Find guides & resources - Will open a new window with https://docs.validmind.ai/ open in it. Once clicked the item will be completed.

Hovering on each item will provide further detail to the user.
<img width="1552" alt="image" src="https://github.com/validmind/frontend/assets/16059/515435d0-38f9-4846-889f-64e9cd4321d3">


The Onboarding Guide can be closed to get it out of the way, leaving behind just the trigger on the bottom right corner or it can be completely dismissed. 
<img width="1552" alt="image" src="https://github.com/validmind/frontend/assets/16059/7e12fbd9-8ecc-43af-8cac-0e76203af75b">


To reenable it, user can do so from the Setting/Profile area by switching it back on.
<img width="1552" alt="image" src="https://github.com/validmind/frontend/assets/16059/5f65bb92-f675-4964-8b79-b209ed6a3260">


Once the Onboarding Checklist is completed, it can be reset for reference purposes in the Settings/Profile area.
<img width="1552" alt="image" src="https://github.com/validmind/frontend/assets/16059/7131b5b2-8ee1-4bb5-8a30-121981c3a2fd">
<img width="1552" alt="image" src="https://github.com/validmind/frontend/assets/16059/9da670e8-f54b-41ac-b6d0-f198dc483848">
